hooks.command: grep -n 'console\.log' "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null && echo '[Warning] console.log found - remove before committing' >&2 || true

if [ -f "$(dirname "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH")/tsconfig.json" ] || [ -f "$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel 2>/dev/null)/tsconfig.json" ]; then cd "$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel 2>/dev/null)" && npx tsc --noEmit 2>&1 | grep -E 'error TS' | head -5 >&2 || true; fi

grep -nE '(sk-[a-zA-Z0-9]{20,}|api_key\s*=\s*["\x27][^"\x27]+["\x27]|password\s*=\s*["\x27][^"\x27]+["\x27])' "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null && echo '[SECURITY] Possible hardcoded secret detected!' >&2 || true

COUNT_FILE="/tmp/claude-edit-count-$$"; COUNT=$(cat "$COUNT_FILE" 2>/dev/null || echo 0); COUNT=$((COUNT + 1)); echo $COUNT > "$COUNT_FILE"; if [ $COUNT -eq 15 ]; then echo '[Info] 15 edits this session. Consider /checkpoint if working on a long task.' >&2; fi; if [ $((COUNT % 25)) -eq 0 ] && [ $COUNT -gt 15 ]; then echo "[Info] $COUNT edits. Context may be getting full. Consider /checkpoint." >&2; fi
echo '[DEBUG] Stop hook fired - sound disabled for testing' >&2
